name: Haid Aid Distribution Schema
description: Schema defining verifiable credentials for aid distribution events using Hedera Guardian in the Haid system.
author: Team Haid

recipient_did.description: Decentralized Identifier (DID) of the refugee or recipient.

event_id.description: Unique identifier of the aid event.

aid_type.description: Type of aid distributed (e.g. food, medical, shelter, cash).

quantity.description: Quantity or number of units distributed.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the aid distribution recorded on Hedera.

volunteer_id.description: Identifier or DID of the volunteer who conducted the distribution.

ngo_id.description: Identifier or DID of the NGO managing this event.

location.description: Physical location or camp site of distribution.

signature.description: Cryptographic signature verifying authenticity of the record.
